Gara Gara Bau GBT, Pemkot Surabaya Dinilai Anti Kritik
03 Nov 2019, 14:13 by Anik Hasanah


Gara Gara Bau GBT, Pemkot Surabaya Dinilai Anti Kritik

KBRN, Surabaya : Pemerintah Kota Surabaya dinilai terlalu baper dan terkesan anti kritik terkait kondisi Gelora Bung Tomo (GBT). Bahkan pernyataan sejumlah pejabat Pemkot Surabaya terkesan terlalu emosional dalam menanggapi pernyataan  Gubernur Jawa Timur perihal aroma sampah yang kerap tercium di stadion GBT. Dosen Fisip Universitas Airlangga (Unair) Surabaya, Airlangga Pribadi Kusman mengatakan semestinya pernyataan tersebut dimaknai sebagai rasa perhatian dan rasa sayang Gubernur Jatim terhadap pengelolaan Kota Surabaya, termasuk warga Surabaya dan supporter Surabaya, Bonek Mania. "Bukan sebaliknya justru kembali menyerang Gubernur. Toh apa yang disampaikan itu adalah fakta sebenarnya mengingat posisi GBT berdekatan dengan TPA Benowo. Jangan baper, harusnya ini menjadi bahan introspeksi," kata Angga saat ditemui di Surabaya, Minggu (3/11/2019). Menurut Angga, komentar Khofifah semata-mata agar Pemkot Surabaya membenahi pengelolaan sampah, yang hanya berjarak sekitar 200 meter dari Stadion GBT. Mengingat GBT merupakan salah satu stadion yang diajukan ke FIFA untuk  menjadi venue pertandingan Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021 mendatang."Sebenarnya hal itu tidak perlu direspon reaktif, karena response reaktif itu justru menghalangi pembenahan Kota Surabaya, yang saat ini sudah baik justru lebih baik lagi," katanya.Angga juga menyayangkan sikap netizen yang ramai-ramai menyikapi negatif pernyataan Khofifah soal GBT tersebut. Bahkan, netizen terkesan sengaja membenturkan Gubernur Khofifah dengan Wali Kota Surabaya Tri Rismaharini."Terkait bau sampah di GBT, ada baiknya dimaknai sebagai ajakan positif untuk memberi kerangka solutif terbaik, seperti mempercepat program, baik yang tengah dilakukan oleh Provinsi Jatim maupun Kota Surabaya, untuk membangun pengelolaan limbah lebih cepat dan lebih baik lagi," kata Angga.Angga mengungkapkan, manajemen Persebaya maupun supporter juga mengakui mencium aroma tidak sedap dalam sejumlah pertandingan. Tentunya ini akan menimbulkan kesan negatif saat FIFA melakukan kunjungan ke GBT. Angga pun yakin, Gubernur Khofifah tetap ingin GBT terpilih menjadi salah satu venue pertandingan Piala Dunia U21 Tahun 2021 mendatang. Tentunya hal tersebut membawa kebanggaan bagi warga Surabaya maupun Jawa Timur secara keseluruhan. "Ini harus dimaknai sebagai bentuk dukungan Jawa Timur terhadap citra dan nama baik Indonesia di mata dunia. Jangan dimaknai dengan sempit sebatas wilayah Surabaya atau Malang. Tapi konteksnya adalah negara," tuturnya. Seperti diketahui, Pemkot Surabaya meradang pasca Gubernur Jawa Timur, khofifah Indar Parawansa menyebut jika arah angin ke Gelora Bung Tomo (GBT) sering aroma  sampah sampai stadion.  Pernyataan Khofifah tersebut lantas ramai-ramai direspon anak buah Risma diantaranya Kabag Humas Pemkot Surabaya Febriadhitya Prajatara, Kepala Badan Perencanaan Pembangunan Daerah Kota Surabaya Eri Cahyadi, dan Kepala Bidang Sarana dan Prasarana Dispora Surabaya Edi Santoso.

Gara Gara Bau GBT, Surabaya City Government Assessed Anti-Criticism
03 Nov 2019, 14:13 by Anik Hasanah


Gara Gara Bau GBT, Surabaya City Government Assessed Anti-Criticism

KBRN, Surabaya: The Government of the City of Surabaya is considered too baper and seems anti-criticism related to the condition of Gelora Bung Tomo (GBT). Even the statements of a number of Surabaya City Government officials seemed too emotional in response to the statement of the Governor of East Java about the scent of garbage that is often smelled at the GBT stadium. Airlangga University Surabaya (Airlangga University) Social Sciences Lecturer, Airlangga Kusman said the statement should be interpreted as a sense of concern and affection of the East Java Governor for the management of the City of Surabaya, including residents of Surabaya and Surabaya supporters, Bonek Mania. "It's not the other way around, but instead attacks the Governor again. After all, what was conveyed is the actual fact considering the position of the GBT adjacent to the Benowo TPA. Don't baper, this should be a matter of introspection," Angga said when met in Surabaya, Sunday (11/03/2019). According to Angga, Khofifah's comments were solely for Surabaya City Government to fix waste management, which is only about 200 meters from the GBT Stadium. Considering that GBT is one of the stadiums proposed to FIFA to become the venue for the U21 World Cup in 2021. "Actually it does not need to be reactively responded, because the reactive response actually hinders the improvement of the City of Surabaya, which is now better and better. again, "he said. Nor also regretted the attitude of netizens who were busy responding negatively to Khofifah's statement about the GBT. In fact, netizens seem to deliberately hit Governor Khofifah with Surabaya Mayor Tri Rismaharini. "Regarding the smell of rubbish in GBT, it is better to be interpreted as a positive invitation to provide the best solutive framework, such as accelerating the program, both being carried out by East Java Province and the City of Surabaya, for building waste management faster and better, "said Angga. Angga revealed, the management of Persebaya and supporters also admitted to smell unpleasant odors in a number of matches. Surely this will create a negative impression when FIFA visits the GBT. Angga also believes that Governor Khofifah still wants GBT to be chosen as one of the venues for the U21 World Cup in 2021. Of course, this brings pride for the citizens of Surabaya and East Java as a whole. "This must be interpreted as a form of East Java's support for the image and reputation of Indonesia in the eyes of the world. Do not be interpreted narrowly limited to the area of Surabaya or Malang. But the context is the country," he said. As is known, Surabaya City Government is inflamed after the Governor of East Java, khofifah Indar Parawansa said that the direction of the wind to Gelora Bung Tomo (GBT) often smells of garbage reaching the stadium. Khofifah's statement was then responded by Risma's subordinates, including the Head of Public Relations of Surabaya City Government, Febriadhitya Prajatara, Head of the Surabaya City Regional Development Planning Agency Eri Cahyadi, and Head of the Surabaya Dispora Facilities and Infrastructure Division Edi Santoso.
